short.ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,es_419,et,fa,: IG Track, The Instagram Tracker to find out ghost followers, mass unfollowers easily!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get insights about your Instagram profile. Spot ghost followers and unfollow them easily.

Get full report about your Instagram profile. Find who is not following you back and who unfollowed you. Unfollow them in a click.

# Features
✓ Not Following Me Back - People who don't follow you back
✓ I'm Not Following Back - People you don't follow back
✓ Mutual Followers - People you follow, and they also follow you back
✓ Lost Followers - People who unfollowed you recently
✓ New Followers - People who followed you recently
✓ Followers - People who follow you
✓ Followings - People you follow
✓ Persistent data storage when switching Instagram accounts
✓ Random Interval range ensures your account safety
✓ Data Chart Analysis

2️⃣ How to get started?
1. Log in to the Instagram account you need to analyze.
2. Click the 'Open Dashboard' button.
3. Click 'Refresh' button.


3️⃣ FAQ
If you have any problems, don't hesitate to contact us at pingappsteam@tailang.top

4️⃣ Data Privacy
All the data you process is on your local computer and never passes through our servers.

5️⃣ Statement
INSTAGRAM is a trademark of Instagram, LLC. IGComments is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or otherwise related to INSTAGRAM, Inc. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.

# It's free?
Yes, it is free.
if you need to use advanced features, you need to subscribe to our service.
